name: Apkudo
overview:
Apkudoâ€™s mission is to help the Android ecosystem overcome the major challenge inherent in the open nature of the Android platform: fragmentation.

Apkudo App Analytics allows developers to see their apps run on every Android device from the G1 onwards, so they can release their apps with confidence. Apkudo tackles fragmentation by installing, executing, and exercising applications on every available Android device. Developers receive video playback of their apps running on real devices, screen shots, and test reports detailing execution and performance results across the whole Apkudo device portfolio. Free.

Apkudo Device Analytics uses the top apps on Google Play and a range of other custom analytic methodologies to help OEMs and Operators assure that new smartphones and tablets offer mobile subscribers a best-in-class user experience. Apkudo Device Analytics uses a mix of core Android system applications and a representative workload of the top 400 apps to define and characterize multiple attributes of the user experience.
